app_description: Voice translation was never so easy! With the power of the ChatGPT API Voice Translator allows for seamless communication worldwide. Instantly hear translated phrases on the go making any conversation a breeze with our AI translator. Can t read the menu items in a fancy foreign restaurant Instant camera translation has got you covered! Communicate freely at the airport hotel gas station supermarket or any other place with our voice translator. Read street signs in a foreign country translate manuals of your overseas purchases or the text of any picture you already have in your phone. Just put your personal AI translator into a pocket and use it for all your translating needs! Voice Translator is an essential learning tool for kids and adults learn new phrases and listen to the correct pronunciation. Start using our voice translator now and forget about looking for the correct phrase in the dictionary say any phrase and your interpreter will pronounce the translation out loud! Features: Immediate translation of real time conversations with the voice translator Use your camera for instant text translation Use AI Magic to choose а friendly formal or romantic tone for translated texts Translate texts from your photos and pics Translate as you type in any of your favorite messaging apps Extended offline phrasebook Language detection for text to text mode 100 languages working in speech to speech and text to text modes You can either speak or type to translate your text Smart text to text mode Speed up your text input with typing hints Convert text from languages with non Latin alphabet Copy paste and share translations in a single tap Intuitive dialogue conversation interface of the voice translator Speak the translated phrase out loud Control the speed of voice Male and female voices available Human to Pet and Pet to Human modes for entertainment purposes only . Translate your pet s meow or woof into your language. Our AI translator currently supports the following voice to voice languages: Arabic Saudi Arabia Catalan Spain Chinese Simplified Chinese Traditional Chinese Cantonese Czech Czechia Danish Denmark Dutch Netherlands English Australia English Canada English India English United Kingdom English United States Finnish Finland French Canada French France German Germany Greek Greece Hebrew Israel Hindi Italian Italy Japanese Japan Korean South Korea Norwegian Bokmål Norway Polish Poland Portuguese Brazil Portuguese Portugal Romanian Romania Russian Russia Slovak Slovakia Spanish Latin America Spanish Mexico Spanish Spain Swedish Sweden Thai Thailand Turkish Turkey and more You can choose a free trial with all the features available to experience the power of our AI translator. UNLIMITED ACCESS TO ALL FEATURES You can subscribe for unlimited access to all features within Voice Translator. Subscriptions are billed weekly monthly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan. Parts of service translated by Google Translate . Privacy Policy: http: bpmob.com voicetranslator privacy Terms of Use: http: bpmob.com voicetranslator terms ChatGPT is unavailable in China
